answers.author: Arnoldo Perez
answers.text:
The Institute of Internal Auditors is a good resource, 
https://na.theiia.org/Pages/IIAHome.aspx
The Association of Local Government Auditors is another good resource, 
http://algaonline.org/index.aspx?NID=151
Larger cities have most of their audit reports posted on-line and provide great insight on how they approached the same issue.

author: Jamie Ludovic
text:
We are looking at conducting a financial risk assessment for our community that includes the amount of cash risk for various departments.  I was wondering if any communities have developed risk factors and/or have a tool for conducting this type of assessment?  We are a relatively small community and looking to start with a simple evaluation of risk areas.  
Thanks,
Jamie
jludovic@garnernc.gov
title: Internal Audit - Risk Assessment Tools
